channel.title: Features Index on Repton Projects
channel.description: Recent content in Features Index on Repton Projects

item.title: Features Index
item.description: All aspects of Project Management in one place Project on Demands's workflow and associated toolkit guides you through your project step by step. Projects Projects Create, Monitor and control your projects. View Details Stakeholders Collaborate with your project team. View Details Workflow Dashboard View the current status of your project. View Details Phase Progression Guides you through six project phases. View Details Documents Create, review & Approve key project documents.

item.title: Projects page
item.description: Project Configuration Only do the things that add real value. Quickly set up your project Create a new project and assign a start date and you are ready to go. Get Started » Manage your team Assign team members as project stakeholders. Get Started » Ensure you are only doing the things that add value Configure the required project tasks and documents. Get Started »
